channel.title: wiki issues June 2019
channel.description:
Due to a security upgrade which was required to be applied, and absence of a webmaster volunteer, there are some wiki issues.
* mboxes broken: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:First_Time_User * ~~https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:FlaggedRevs broken, therefore for now only admins may do edits.~~
I will try to fix this over the next days.

item.title: wiki issues June 2019
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
mboxes are somewhat fixed. At least now the text is visible again as a stopgap. The boxes we used previously are insane. Their implementation is incredibly complex. It requires a mediawiki extension to process lua scripts and then “thousands” of Module: and whenever you get closer to importing them all, another obscure error occurs.

So it’s now simple wiki template https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:Mbox which looks worse than before but at least works. Anyone with some mediawiki / html / css knowledge could make it more pretty.

Read full topic

item.title: wiki issues June 2019
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Due to a security upgrade which was required to be applied, and absence of a webmaster volunteer, there are some wiki issues.

  • mboxes broken: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:First_Time_User
  • https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:FlaggedRevs broken, therefore for now only admins may do edits.

I will try to fix this over the next days.

Read full topic
